Package VideoPoker

Class DebugMode

java.lang.Object
VideoPoker.DebugMode
public class DebugMode extends Object
Class that runs the debug mode, where the poker game is fully loaded from two files and played according them
Author:
Joao Gomes(96248), Matilde Oliva(96283), Miguel Vicente(96288)

  • Constructor Details

    • DebugMode

      public DebugMode(String Credit, String cmdFile, String cardFile) throws PlayingCardException
      Default constructor, open the files to read from and initialize player credits. All variables from cmd line.
      Parameters:
      Credit - player initial credit
      cmdFile - File with the commands to play the game
      cardFile - File where we take the cards to play
      Throws:
      PlayingCardException - preventing from an exception in file reader and scan

  • Method Details

    • getCommands

      public List<String> getCommands(String cmdFile) throws PlayingCardException
      Method that read and take the commands from the file im cmd line so the debug mode can be played properly
      Parameters:
      cmdFile - File with the debug mode commands
      Returns:
      List A list with all the commands that will be played
      Throws:
      PlayingCardException - preventing from an exception in file reader and scan

      Method to check which mode of the game the file request us to play.
      Parameters:
      playerCommand - File with the debug mode commands
